DOC.brief_summary: This protocol intends to detail investigations necessary to evaluate the ocular safety of subjects enrolled in study A4321001 and who have received formulated Drug Product (Lot 8716-098).
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Safety Follow Up Study Of Subjects Enrolled In Study A4321001 And Who Have Received Drug Product
DOC.criteria: A subset of subjects enrolled in study A4321001 and who have received formulated drug product (Lot 8716098) will be included in the safety follow up study.
